```
data Exp = Num Int
         | Bool Bool
         | Var Var
         | If Exp Exp Exp
         | Lambda Var Exp
         | App Exp Exp
data Type = TyInt | TyBool | TyArrow Type Type

```

```
type TExp = (TExp', Type)
data TExp' = TNum Int
           | TBool Bool
           | TVar Var
           | TIf TExp TExp TExp
           | TLambda Var TExp
           | TApp TExp TExp

```

```
type TExp = (TExp', Maybe Type)
data TExp' = TNum Int
           | TBool Bool
           | TVar Var
           | TIf TExp TExp TExp
           | TLambda Var TExp
           | TApp TExp TExp

```

```
data TExp = TNum Int
          | TBool Bool
          | TVar Var
          | TIf TExp TExp TExp
          | TLambda Var Type TExp
          | TApp TExp TExp

```

```
data ExpF a = Num Int
            | Bool Bool
            | Var Var
            | If a a a
            | Lambda Var a
            | App a a
newtype Exp = Exp (ExpF Exp)
newtype TExp = TExp (ExpF TExp, Type)

```
